isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500, 8600 Models Built Before 05/20/2003 - POWER DISTRIBUTION AND GROUNDS - ACCESSORY POWER DISTRIBUTION - EXTENDED DESCRIPTION

svcproc.title: EXTENDED DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: When the key is moved to the ignition or accessory position, power will be supplied on circuit A12AB and A12 to the accessory relay in power distribution fuse block (1012). The accessory relay will energize. Power from circuit A14AV will pass through the accessory relay contacts on circuit A12B, providing 12 volts to the accessory fuses.
